title: The Devil's Daughter by Suzie Grant
description:

Gade Ryder returns to Eden, Texas, after twelve years to investigate a gang of rustlers on the family ranch. Had he accepted the job out of misplaced family loyalty or was it the compelling mystery of the devilÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s daughter keeping him in the one place he didn't want to be?
